name: Planemo
description:
A short PS1 homebrew shoot em up.

After you crash land on a planemo, a planet with no star to orbit around, you must fend for yourself in your rescue pod to find a way off the planet.

***PLEASE NOTE***

This game is in a pretty buggy state, but can be played to completion.

One big glitch to be aware of is if no sprites appear after you press start at the beginning. You must reset the game (with shift + F8) and try again. The sprites usually appear if you wait around 2 seconds before pressing start.

CREDITS

DANIEL TURNER - PROGRAMMING

MCSWEG - MODELLING

MARMAR - MUSIC

GREG EDWARDS - SOUND EFFECTS

DAYWALKER - SPRITES

JUSTINF - LEVEL DESIGN
